io.netty.channel.group

Class ChannelGroupException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.netty.channel.ChannelException
            • io.netty.channel.group.ChannelGroupException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Iterable<Map.Entry<Channel,Throwable>>

    public class ChannelGroupException
extends ChannelException
implements Iterable<Map.Entry<Channel,Throwable>>
    ChannelException which holds ChannelFutures that failed because of an error.
    See Also:

      Iterator<Map.Entry<Channel,Throwable>> iterator()
